pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Interface to the Statistical Disclosure Control Package 'sdcTable' // The main function, ProtectTable(), performs table suppression according to a frequency rule with a data set as the only required input. Within this function, protectTable() or protectLinkedTables() in package 'sdcTable' is called. Lists of level-hierarchy (parameter 'dimList') and other required input to these functions are created automatically.
